info.title: Application resource reader
info.description: This class is used for the application to have access to its resources.

method.name: get
method.description: Get an application resource. This function will decide whether to load the resource from the project or from the published path.

parameter.name: $resourcePath
parameter.description: The resource subpath from the resource root folder down.

method.name: getURL
method.description: Get a resolved url pointing to an application resource file.

parameter.name: $resourcePath
parameter.description: The resource subpath from the resource root folder down.

method.name: getApplicationPath
method.description: Gets the application's library path to the latest version, according to current running domain.
